item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Rick's Roadhouse (in the Jewelry District near Olga's Cup & Saucer, and across the street from The Apartment  - you all remember that one from last week, so this shouldn't be difficult to find).

Rick's Roadhouse is a big, open industrial-feeling space with a large bar and lots o' BBQ! There are huge garage doors that open out to a large patio outside - a big plus when this heat breaks by Monday. I can't believe its been over 2 YEARS since we've had an official MNM at Ricks - shocking!!!  So, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver flower in my hair or pinned somewhere, but we're hard to miss and very friendly!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - Rick's Roadhouse!
